title: Remember Me (Coco OST)
lyrics: tone Remember me Though I have to say goodbye Remember me Don't let it make you cry For even if I'm far away I hold you in my heart I sing a secret song to you each night we are a part Remember me Though I have to travel far Remember me Each time you hear a sad gui tar Know that I'm with you the only way that I can be ~ Until you're in my arms a gain Remember me
